hu.kazocsaba.math.geometry

Class Plane

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.kazocsaba.math.geometry.Plane
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Plane3

    public class Plane
extends Object
    An infinite plane. It is specified with a point and a normal vector. The normal is not necessarily unit length.
    Author:
    Kaz√≥ Csaba
